content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”content-set”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Who we are?

Naz Intellectual Services was founded in 2018 with an aim to provide exceptional legal services to ease your problems. We have a decades of working experience in the field of intellectual property, cooperate and commercial law. We are a team of expert lawyers, analysts and legal experts. Our goal is to make your life stress-free through the elimination of unnecessary formalities and excessive bureaucracy. We ensure outstanding performance of our team members. Our team is our pride that is strengthening the foundation of our company. We are a full-service Pakistani law firm accommodating the commercial, civil, labor and banking laws.

What we do?

We believe in giving you advice that matters. At Naz Intellectual Services, we are committed to excellence. Our sincere dedication and hard work are winning hearts and enhancing our clientele. We are offering services for:

  • Law services
  • Trademark registration
  • Intellectual property
  • Company registration
  • Consultancy services

The firm’s IP practice has received wide recognition in the sector. The firm represents some of the most prominent companies in the world and assists them in protecting invaluable IP assets. We provide a wide range of services in the IP arena, starting with due diligence including Market Surveys, IP Searches, etc, and continuing forth to the registration of trademarks, patents, designs and copyrights and finally to the enforcement of rights through litigation and search and seizure operations. Retaining a client is more important for us than winning a client. We are working with this approach in mind and progressing with each passing day.

Our mission:

Winning a client though dedication while making them feel safe and secure.

Our values:

  • Enthusiasm
  • Excellence
  • Professionalism
  • Reliance
  • Trust
  • Comfort
  • Credibility
  • Satisfaction

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

What sets us apart?

Professional lawyers and advisors:

Due to 100% transparency, we ensure full security to our valuable clients for all our services. We have an expert team to respond and act as per your requirement. Professional lawyers and advisors came from diversified backgrounds to give you excellent results.

LET OUR EXPERIENCE BE YOUR GUIDE!

Quick response time:

Our dedicated team is serving you day and night to answer all your queries and fulfill all your requirements within short period of time. We are available online 24/7 to assure you that we are here to help you whenever you need us.

WE ARE PUTTING COMMITMENTS TO WORK!

Affordable rates:

Good quality services and lower rates than our competitors are helping us to grow day by day. These qualities are adding perfection to our work. We are a law firm that help you to get great solutions to your worst problems.

YOUR SOLUTIONS START HERE!

Client-centered approach:

Everyone is different so their needs are also unique. We serve each client in a special way. We follow client-centered approach to provide our best services to you. We are built to bring revolution like never before.

WE PRIORITIZE YOUR PRIORITIES!

Comprehensive legal services:

The firm’s clients acknowledge our ability to identify and resolve issues quickly and effectively, even in the most difficult circumstances. We strive to provide comprehensive legal services to safeguard commercial asset and enforce proprietary rights by creating a synergy between law and industrial knowledge.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
